text:
Sen Rubio, @ChrisCoons & colleagues introduced a bill to impose targeted sanctions on Russian officials complicit in brazen violations of int'l law,including the recent poisoning of opposition leader & anti-corruption activist #AlexeiNavalny.

Read More ⬇️
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=1DC178B5-CBE8-4D11-BB9B-3D73BF293232

Sen. Rubio joined @HudsonInstitute for a conversation on U.S. foreign policy & more.

Read and watch⬇️
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=5D715870-E470-4EA9-A151-2726C4440FC0

Today I sent a letter to the DOJ about a report that raises legitimate questions that deserve to be addressed. Read more here: https://www.paul.senate.gov/sites/default/files/page-attachments/PaulLettertoBarr.pdf
When the government (aka Dr. Fauci) tells you the science is settled, remember Galileo’s response: "Eppur si muove."

Dr. Fauci - this article in Science proposes that heterogeneity of human populations allows for non-random transmission where immunity concentrates in younger less vulnerable members of the population. Therefor herd immunity may occur at less than 2/3rds. https://science.sciencemag.org/content/369/6505/846.full

Kelley and I are praying for the swift recovery of the 2 police officers shot last night in Louisville.  When will Democrat mayors around the US restore order in our cities?

2 Louisville officers shot amid Breonna Taylor protests https://apnews.com/article/shootings-frankfort-kentucky-louisville-breonna-taylor-28a283922de8784f6fca5c42fe8e5bca

RT @JulieOliverTX Donald Trump doesn't decide whether or not he leaves office.

We do.

Yes. Trump is moving us in an authoritarian direction. But despair is not an option. We must take action to preserve American democracy. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309197452407459840/img/aqn06_EQP6dAu215.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309197452407459840/vid/320x320/UTnPAOWhyQdvK0z2.mp4?tag=13
The American people, no matter what their political persuasion, must make it clear that American democracy will not be destroyed. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EismTAtXYAAkgMu.jpg
Transcript of clip: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eisnc1ZWoAEs0uY.png

Trump's strategy to delegitimize this election and to stay in office if he loses is not complicated. Finding himself behind in many polls, he is attempting massive voter suppression. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309180595394600960/img/SiE4OVTXBgft5MfY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309180595394600960/vid/480x270/SCctR9E7A2uLbSr6.mp4?tag=13

To my Republican colleagues in the Congress, please do not continue to tell the American people how much you love America if, at this critical moment, you are not prepared to stand up to defend American democracy and our way of life. 

Stop the hypocrisy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eisk2aWWAAAX7Fq.jpg
Transcript of clip: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eiskbm2XsAACkwO.png

I understand that Donald Trump was born to a very wealthy family and, from his earliest days, was able to get anything he wanted.

But let me make this clear to Donald Trump: Too many people have fought and died to defend American democracy.

You are not going to destroy it. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309178455506825216/img/k0Ct54MXgd7DWwaj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309178455506825216/vid/480x270/P-f5VLsmBLGhWJDY.mp4?tag=13
Transcript of clip: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EisjMXkXgAU9xIc.png

The United States is the oldest continuous democracy in the modern world.

We held elections in the middle of the Civil War, during the Great Depression and during World War II.

But today, under Trump, that peaceful transition of power is being threatened like never before. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309177524253896704/img/zgwekyzcCqJRTbZS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309177524253896704/vid/480x270/hlr8dA5hUD9uI1j2.mp4?tag=13
This is not just an election between Donald Trump and Joe Biden. This is an election between Donald Trump and democracy – and democracy must win. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EisheACWAAAwXIa.jpg

For the first time, we are facing an election where it is not clear that a sitting president will voluntarily leave office if he loses. Watch my live address on what we must do to prepare for Trump’s unique threat to our democracy: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cjt1fjMyNzU3OTl8MXZPeHdrYXZ5bU14QpoVwks1M1xILxQEOVJqYByeIh0NWxztYxvq5J0M6LJs

RT @commondefense In 1 hour, @BernieSanders will give a major speech about the incredible stakes of this moment, and how we can’t allow our country to slide into authoritarianism.

Every American who values our democracy should tune in. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1308946974146736128 QT @BernieSanders This is what an authoritarian sounds like.

Tomorrow, at 1 p.m. ET, I will be delivering an address on the unprecedented and dangerous moment we are in right now given President Trump’s unique threats to our democracy.

Watch at http://live.berniesanders.com. https://twitter.com/kaitlancollins/status/1308895794947387393

RT @USATODAY With plans to frame the president's behavior as "unique threats to our democracy," Bernie Sanders is set to deliver an afternoon address at George Washington University in Washington, D.C. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/elections/2020/09/24/bernie-sanders-give-speech-warning-trump-might-not-accept-election-results/3502522001/

This election is about more than Democrat vs. Republican. It is about democracy vs. authoritarianism. I'll be addressing Trump's threat to our nation today at 1 p.m. ET at http://live.berniesanders.com. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EirzeJ0XkAopmY1.jpg

RT @PplsAction We are working to create a democracy that cares for rural communities. Join us for the "Fighting for Rural America Town Hall" with Senator @BernieSanders and People’s Action member organizations and help us #WINRural. https://ppls.ac/rural

RT @TVietor08 It is truly inexcusable that climate change isn't a topic at the first debate. It is one of the most important issues facing the country / humanity, and it is one of the biggest contrasts between the two candidates

RT @nowthisnews ‘We have to reclaim our public systems.’ — #TBT Rep. @AOC explained how the Green New Deal for Public Housing Act will fix public housing, create jobs, and reduce CO2 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKZAVwPXUAAZBfA.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199715893544136706/vid/320x320/bF_7P_RwAGeQT60s.mp4?tag=13
In just 40 days, the American people will elect their next president—and that president should be the person who makes the decision about who will be nominated to the Supreme Court.
RT @JoeBiden Once again, we are called to ask ourselves whether justice could be equally applied in America. But what's clear is that today in America, Black women deserve better.

This week was yet another heart wrenching reminder of our urgent need to reform our justice system from the inside out. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EitVtUvX0AI2H8m.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309232910495555584/vid/320x320/-fCxF--nZHe5r_V1.mp4?tag=13

Black Americans don’t need to be reminded that inequity runs deep in our country. It’s a painful reality every day. We will only begin to fully heal when our nation addresses the systemic racism in our laws, policies, and institutions. @JoeBiden and I have a plan to do just that.

RT @JoeBiden We are a more just, more equal nation because of Justice Ginsburg. Now it’s up to all of us to carry on her fight. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309161762600742913/img/Hq6xHBcbtcd1_I7h.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309161762600742913/vid/320x320/LAynGZjd2on9f9vt.mp4?tag=13
Keep speaking Breonna Taylor’s name.

In the wealthiest nation in the history of the world, hunger is a political choice. While Senate Republicans believe we can't afford to help millions of American families struggling to put food on the table, they had no problem providing a trillion-dollar tax break to the rich. https://twitter.com/theintercept/status/1308827589126090754 QT @theintercept The proportion of American children who sometimes do not have enough to eat is now as much as 14 times higher than it was last year. https://trib.al/8x3yd59

Here's what Senate Republicans said when they blocked President Obama's Supreme Court nominee. Do they have any integrity?

The right thing to do for this vacancy is clear, and Senate Republicans know it. They've stated it clearer than I could. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eir7qbqXgAQ5tvF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309124318689923078/vid/320x320/lUN-BC4sCcz7SOYm.mp4?tag=13

Money is not speech.
 
Corporations are not people.
 
Let us end Citizens United, move to the public funding of elections and restore our democracy.

Bloomberg highlights States w/ unemployment ABOVE 10%: NY, NJ, PA, RI & MA.

And States w/ unemployment BELOW 7.5%:  TX, FL & GA. 

What does the first group have in common?  All state governments are dominated by Dems.

And the second group?  All GOP. 🤔 https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2020-09-21/why-a-coronavirus-recession-in-florida-is-a-depression-in-new-york

RT @RichardGrenell It’s time we highlight the bias of the News Editors picking the stories/angles and hiding behind their desks. 

Who is responsible for selecting the @CBSThisMorning news stories? I can guarantee you it’s a left wing activist.

So, when California has rolling blackouts, now you’ll have no lights, no a/c, and...your govt-mandated electric car won’t recharge. 💡💡 https://twitter.com/latimes/status/1308830354132918277 QT @latimes California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Wednesday issued an executive order to restrict new car sales in the state to only zero-emission vehicles by 2035 and threw his support behind a ban on the controversial use of hydraulic fracturing by oil companies.
https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-09-23/gavin-newsom-fracking-ban-california-zero-emissions-cars

Inconvenient truths. https://twitter.com/prageru/status/1309182277146931201 QT @prageru A ban on gas-powered cars in California? It's the sixth-largest economy in the world, yet emits only 1% of the world’s carbon emissions, and electric cars present their own environmental problems. But hey, this is California! http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1309180482941104138/img/OTe4keGrYWhmwsLY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1309180482941104138/vid/320x320/XlABc3yWsvC4R8dt.mp4?tag=13

RT @KENS5 Sen. Ted Cruz on Supreme Court nomination fight: It’s not hypocrisy, it’s politics https://www.kens5.com/article/news/politics/sen-ted-cruz-on-supreme-court-nomination-its-not-hypocrisy-its-politics/287-db6ca4c0-5da9-4f42-a3fb-8b1f309613be

Absolutely right. https://twitter.com/benshapiro/status/1309166728916750338 QT @benshapiro I'll start believing the media's concerns about a Trumpian coup are legit when they start asking Joe Biden about conceding the election, packing the Supreme Court, killing the filibuster, adding states...or really, anything at all other than "WHY IS THE ORANGE MAN BAD?"

RT @ChadPergram From the pool. Cruz: There is going to be a peaceful transition of power..the real threat is the threat that Joe Biden has been explicit about, that if he loses the election he intends to challenge the election. I expect Biden to file litigation..to dispute the legitimacy..

Each chapter of One Vote Away talks about a different constitutional right we're one vote away from having stripped away: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1684511348/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=cruz5-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=1684511348&linkId=866a1912261b00d4d08ec011f5faa93d

I'll also continue to push for a relief package which includes provisions to secure federal unemployment benefits, restart the Paycheck Protection Program, help parents with the expenses of childcare and homeschooling, and help our schools keep kids safe. https://www.romney.senate.gov/romney-pushes-bill-prevent-massive-layoffs-airline-workers
